survey_name: Employee Feedback on Workplace Mental Health Support Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and adequacy of mental health support initiatives provided by the organization.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health support resources currently available at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health support resources currently available at your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health support services have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Consider randomizing the order of options to avoid bias.
